articles.author: Chris Doyle
articles.title: Rio Ferdinand explains why Harry Maguire should not be in England's Euro 2020 squad - The Mirror
articles.description: Former Man Utd centre-half Rio Ferdinand reckons it was the wrong decision for Gareth Southgate to select the injured Harry Maguire for the European Championships
articles.content:
Rio Ferdinand has criticised Gareth Southgate's decision to name injured Harry Maguire in England's Euro 2020 squad. 
 The head coach announced his final squad for this summer's European Championshi… [+3201 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Soccer-Lingard among six dropped by England from final Euro squad - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -     England manager Gareth Southgate named four right backs including Trent Alexander-Arnold in his final 26-man squad for the European championship on Tuesday after dropping in-form attacking midfielder Jesse Lingard and five other players.
